entry.title: Friday: A few clouds. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 28. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow before morning. Wind north 30 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 before morning. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Blowing snow. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Blowing snow. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 45 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023
